backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor serving as a placeholder backend with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the modification of SnowfallBackground component to render snowflakes in red tones instead of white/blue gradients.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing components for a snowflakes-themed web application with animated backgrounds.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes with neutral grayscale values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Artistic Snowflakes Web Page application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component composing Header, Hero, Gallery, Footer, and SnowfallBackground into a layered layout.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice, caffeine.ai attribution link, and a poetic quote about snowflakes.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Gallery component rendering a grid of six snowflake images with hover effects and modal dialogs for detailed viewing.
frontend/src/components/HailBackground.t: Empty file placeholder for a hail background animation component (no implementation present).
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying 'Crystalline Beauty' title with animated spinning snowflake icons on either side.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section featuring poetic prose about snowflakes with elegant typography and centered layout.
frontend/src/components/RainBackground.t: Canvas-based animated rain background rendering elongated raindrops with wind drift, devicePixelRatio support, and prefers-reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/components/SnowfallBackgrou: Canvas-based animated snowfall background rendering circular particles with red radial gradients, gentle falling speed, devicePixelRatio support, and prefers-reduced-motion accessibility.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, switching between anonymous and authenticated actors based on Internet Identity state, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence via DFINITY AuthClient, and delegation validation with configurable idle/expiry behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file indicating the application does not require backend queries and uses only static local content.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH-based design tokens defining a winter-themed mauve/fuchsia color palette for both light and dark modes, including custom winter-specific color variables and gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then mounts to the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the theme with OKLCH color tokens (including winter-specific colors), custom animations (snowfall, float, shimmer), typography plugin, and container queries support.
project_state.json: Project metadata documenting the Crystalline Beauty winter-themed landing page architecture, including React/Tailwind/ICP integration patterns, known issues (missing dialog component, dual CSS files), and a catalog of 13 existing features from layout to animations.
